position: Founder -The Dream Junction || Senior Associate Engineer- Global Foundries

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: The dream junction is innovative learning and educational platform in ruralvillage of Prayagraj which connects dreamers with the opportunities andalong with this its unique way of establishing education as a way of learningin an entertaining and creative manner also it approach students byconnecting it with stories and some curious activities. it connects rural schoolgoing students to see the sea of opportunities and not to fall in the loopholeof Jobucation ( a term developed by us to explain people who thinkseducation is merely earned to get a job).

experience.description:
ACHIEVEMENTS -:Multiple Appreciation awards for Mentoring ,Teamwork and Exceptional Performance .Quality support to FAB 1 (Dresden)and Currently
contributing to its  development and improvement using my knowledge of  CMOS process flow in 22nm ,28nm ,40nm ,55nm and contamination-free manufacturing. and Utilising statistical process control
(SPC) techniques to ensure high-quality manufacturing processes and Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and classify faults and
defects in the manufacturing process. Utilize Microsoft Office
tools to analyze data and generate reports. Demonstrate strong
communication, teamwork, and leadership skills to effectively contribute to
the success of the team.
